mdRecord.dcterms:title: Particular Description and Manner of building a house for Thomas Law, circa 1794
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Manuscript descriptions of the architectural plans for the Thomas Law House, designed by architect William Lovering and built circa 1794 on the 689 square in the City of Washington fronting on west side of New Jersey Avenue and South C Street. Agreement between Law and Lovering and description of construction details. Referenced drawings not included. Autograph document, 11 pages. Several pages bound together.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Law, Thomas, 1756-1834
